trans-unit.target: Error del compilador CS0227 | Documentos de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: Unsafe code may only appear if compiling with /unsafe
trans-unit.target: El código no seguro solo puede aparecer si se compila con /unsafe

trans-unit.source: If source code contains the [unsafe](../../csharp/language-reference/keywords/unsafe.md) keyword, then the [/unsafe](../../csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/unsafe-compiler-option.md) compiler option must also be used.
trans-unit.target: Si el código fuente contiene la [unsafe](../../csharp/language-reference/keywords/unsafe.md) (palabra clave), el [/ unsafe](../../csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/unsafe-compiler-option.md) también debe utilizarse la opción del compilador.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Unsafe Code and Pointers](../../csharp/programming-guide/unsafe-code-pointers/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [código no seguro y punteros](../../csharp/programming-guide/unsafe-code-pointers/index.md).

trans-unit.source: To set the unsafe option in [!INCLUDE[vs_current_long](../../csharp/misc/includes/vs_current_long_md.md)], click on **Project** in the main menu, select the **Build** pane, and check the box that says "allow unsafe code."
trans-unit.target: Para establecer la opción no segura [!INCLUDE[vs_current_long](../../csharp/misc/includes/vs_current_long_md.md)], haga clic en **proyecto** en el menú principal, seleccione la **crear** panel y Active la casilla que dice "permitir código no seguro".

trans-unit.source: The following sample, when compiled without **/unsafe**, will generate CS0227:
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente, cuando se compila sin **/unsafe**, genera el error CS0227:
